{"title": "Heron: Steam Machine", "title_search": "heron steam machine", "title_keyword": "heron steam machine", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/heron-steam-machine/", "summary": "[WiiWare] Heron: Steam Machine is a game about a factory where rubber duckies are being produced by a large steam engine. On this steam engine, there are four different gauges which you will have to watch carefully. By connecting the pipes, you will earn points and relieve some of the pressure, keeping the machine running just a little bit longer. If one of the gauges reaches its maximum, the machine will eventually blow up, and the game is over. If you were lucky enough to achieve a high score, make sure you enter your name in the list so other players can compete with you. In Multiplayer, you are able to cooperate with friends in maintaining the steam machine. When you play with two, three or four players, the screen is divided into sections with different background colors. Each player is able to solve his or her own part of the puzzle. Players are restricted to their own section of the screen, so you will have to work together to make the pipes fit properly. (Additional accessories are required for multiplayer play and are sold separately.) [Nintendo]", "genre": ["Action Puzzle"], "metascore": "70", "critic_reviews": 5, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-01-04", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-131555-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-131555-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": "Mixed or average", "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["Europe", "North America"], "companies": ["Triangle Studios (Publisher)", "Triangle Studios (Developer)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)", "Wii", "DS"], "rating": "E"}

{"title": "Stranded Without A Phone", "title_search": "stranded without a phone", "title_keyword": "stranded without a phone", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/stranded-without-a-phone/", "summary": "Stranded! is a desert island survival game set in the Space HoRSE universe.  Four passengers on a space ship were on a mission to colonize a new planet when the ship crash landed on a planet that is almost completely covered by ocean. You are the only survivor - an upper-management executive from the Decoo corporation, the company that sponsored the original mission.  Now you must use your survival skills to stay alive long enough to get rescued. Build shelter, find food and drink, and collect salvageable parts from the wreckage that wash ashore. Use the parts to build a space radio and call for a rescue team to win the game.  Search for natural resources, then use them to create other items using various combinations.  Features: - Familiar RPG-style inventory system. - Over 70 different items. - Randomly generated map with each new game. - Day/night cycle.  *** Contest! *** "Stranded!" reached #1 in the Roleplaying Games category in the App Store, and #8 in Simulations. To celebrate we're going to have a contest to give away a $50 gift certificate for the iTunes store.   The prize will go to the player that wins the game in the least number of game days. To prove that you have won the game, make a screenshot showing the Space Phone in your inventory (before you use it to call for the rescue). To make a screenshot, hold down the power button and press the home button at the same time. The screenshot is saved to your device's camera roll. Send screenshot entries to contest@gilligames.com. Entries must be received by November 21, 12:00 AM Eastern time (Friday night at midnight). Gilligames employees and relatives are not eligible.  *** Reviews *** Overall I'm having fun with this game and am impressed with the whole setup/gameplay. Graphics and sounds are good enough. Presentation is decent. The game is interesting. A worthwhile game. For $2, I recommend it, I give it an 8/10.  - touchArcade  Stranded is a unique addition the offerings in the App Store... The game's excellent graphics and sounds are noteworthy, and the controls are easy and intuitive to use. - Game Itch  *** Hints *** -Search dirt areas for small boulders to build a fire pit. -Use coconuts as an immediate source of nutrition and hydration, but also find fish in shallow water. -Boar meat provides the best nutrition and health. -Search beaches often for useful items from the shipwreck.", "genre": ["RPG"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2009-10-06", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-132130-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-132130-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["Gilligames (Developer)", "Gilligames (Publisher)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "Pocket Quiz: Schweiz", "title_search": "pocket quiz schweiz", "title_keyword": "pocket quiz schweiz", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/pocket-quiz-schweiz/", "summary": "Berner Oberland, Emmentaler Käse, Genfer See, Johanna Spyri, Kantone, Raclette, Wallis… Alles Wissenswerte zum Thema Schweiz in einem Pocket Quiz!  Auf 150 redaktionell aufbereitete Fragen erhalten Sie detaillierte Antworten mit Hintergrundinfos! Darüber hinaus sind spannende Illustrationen enthalten, welche die Fragen/Antworten auflockern und den Inhalt verdeutlichen.  Unsere erfolgreiche Print-Reihe mit über 2 Millionen verkauften Exemplaren können Sie nun auch auf dem iPhone oder iPod Touch spielen.  Treten Sie alleine gegen die Zeit an und spielen Sie 15, 25, 50 oder die kompletten 150 zufällig gestellten Fragen. Doch überlegen Sie nicht zu lang, die Zeit läuft! Bei jeder richtigen Antwort werden Ihnen, in Abhängigkeit der verbleibenden Zeit, Punkte gutgeschrieben. Sammeln Sie viele Punkte um sich einen Platz in der Highscore-Liste zu sichern!  Im Zweispieler-Modus können Sie Ihre Freunde herausfordern und sich an nur einem Gerät den spannenden Fragen stellen. Möge der Beste gewinnen!
